physical_examinations.relevant_findings: T score at the spine was –1.4 and –0.6 at the total hip.
Left-sided subtle ataxia noted during examination.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Neurological examination returned to normal after physical therapy.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: BMD testing indicated total hip T score of −0.7 and anterior-posterior spine T score of −1.9.
BMD testing indicated femoral neck T score of −1.9, total hip T score of −1.0, anterior-posterior spine T score of −2.3.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Total hip BMD declined from −0.6 in 2000 to −1.0 in 2005; anterior-posterior spine T score declined from −1.9 to −2.3.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Normal posture and gait; normal neurological examination with normal cerebellar testing and tandem walk.
